committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation
Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill entitled the "Educational Mining Act of 1982".

summary.text: (Senate disagreed to House amendment) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands to the University of Alaska upon the condition that such school does not reconvey such lands and that no valid mining claims exist on them.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Educational Mining Act of 1982".
